title: Not Playing Around
text:
A Fund Manager Sticks With Mattel for the Long Haul By Lawrence C. Strauss September 12, 2015 
It has been a rough year for Thyra Zerhusen. The lead manager of the $4.6 billion Aston/Fairpointe Mid Cap fund (ticker: CHTTX) enjoys finding gems that have been overlooked by most Wall Street analysts—easy-to-understand, stable businesses at reasonable valuations. Zerhusen has managed the fund since 1999 to great success—it has returned 10% annually, on average, over the past 15 years, beating 96% of its mid-cap peers, according to Morningstar. 
But diamond-mining has been rough work lately, and Zerhusen’s fund is down... Get The Full Story
